code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{actionClearCart,actionVeiwCart}from'../../../actions/actionCart';var CartSummary=function CartSummary(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var cartLength=useSelector(function(state){return state.reducerCart.cart.length;});var totalPrice=useSelector(function(state){return state.reducerCart.totalPrice;});var viewCart=useSelector(function(state){return state.reducerCart.viewCart;});return React.createElement("div",{className:"cart-summary"},React.createElement("div",null,"Numebr of Items: ",cartLength),React.createElement("div",null,"Total Price: ",Number(totalPrice).toFixed(2)),React.createElement("div",{className:"buttons"},React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(actionClearCart());}},"Clear Cart"),React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(actionVeiwCart());}},viewCart?'Hide Cart':'View Cart')));};export default CartSummary;
